wikipedia_page.main: Ken Burton (born January 5, 1970) is a British choral and orchestral conductor, composer, performer, producer, presenter, arranger and judge, known for his work on UK television programmes, particularly on BBC1 Songs Of Praise, on which he appears regularly as a conductor, musical director, arranger, singer, judge, music producer, and music consultant. He was choirmaster for the multi Oscar winning and Grammy winning Marvel film Black Panther, and one of the credited choral conductors on the film Jingle Jangle and has also contributed as a conductor, contractor, and singer to a number of other films including Amazing Grace, and Ugly Dolls.
